name: Morningside Nature Preserve
description: Morningside Nature Preserve consists of 30 acres of protected forest north east of Piedmont Park. The preserve features a large wooden footbridge that crosses South Fork Peachtree Creek. The nature preserve contains a dense network trails and shaded boardwalks. Morningside can be accessed from a trailhead off Lenox Road or two other entrances off Wellbourne Dr and Wildwood Rd.
parking: Morningside Nature Preserve has a free parking lot at the trailhead off Lenox Road.
